resources.string: A doughnut or donut is a type of leavened fried dough. It is popular in many countries and is prepared in various forms as a sweet snack that can be homemade or purchased in bakeries.
An ice cream sandwich is a frozen dessert consisting of ice cream between two biscuits, skins, or cookies.
Frozen yogurt is a frozen dessert made with yogurt and sometimes other dairy and non-dairy products.
You ordered a ice cream Sandwich
